title: London Real CENSORS Rebel Wisdom
description:
A couple of months ago, Rebel Wisdom put out a series of investigations into London Real and interviewer Brian Rose's new 'Digital Freedom Platform'.

Now London Real have filed several fraudulent copyright claims and forced YouTube to take them down. 

This is a serious matter that shows how bad actors can use YouTube's terms of service to evade scrutiny. It goes to the heart of the original concerns about censorship and the big tech platforms. 

Rebel Wisdom has put the original investigation onto Bitchute: https://www.bitchute.com/video/HQzjhqLLWLwF/

And hosted on our website: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/

The films that have been taken down are:

London Real/David Icke, Investigation Update (Removed/Copyright Strike).

London Real Investigation: https://youtu.be/hDM1wTGOjOw

London Real Update, Coffeezilla & Rebel Wisdom: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hBglnc_YKS4

There is also a Medium article on the controversy 'Cashing in on Covid' here: https://medium.com/rebel-wisdom/cashing-in-on-covid-london-real-david-icke-c4cac9f897dc

You can listen to podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com/

To support Rebel Wisdom, and get member benefits including regular Q&As with the interviewees from our films for our members, check out: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
